snippet: The contending Dodgers took Joe Blanton from a last-place Phillies team continuing to cut costs.
abstract: MLB Roundup: Los Angeles Dodgers acquire right-hander Joe Blanton from the Philadelphia Phillies, claiming him on waivers; baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The contending Dodgers took Joe Blanton from a last-place Phillies team continuing to cut costs.

headline.seo: Dodgers Claim Blanton From Phillies on Waivers
headline.main: Blanton Is Traded to Dodgers via Waivers
